content.description: Four different constant forces are exerted on an object of mass <math alttext="2.0 kilograms" overflow="scroll"> <mn>2.0</mn> <mspace width="0.2em"> </mspace> <mtext>kg</mtext> </math>. The figure represents the magnitude and direction of each force exerted on the object.
content.question: If the object is initially at rest, how long will it take the object to reach a speed of <math alttext="2.0 meters per second" overflow="scroll"> <mn>2.0</mn> <mspace width="0.2em"> </mspace> <mtext>m/s</mtext> </math>?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
